short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your NY Times Crossword results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help you share your New York Times Crossword results. Comes in a similar format to Wordle's result-sharing. Has a compact and full view to share results.
